snippet: In pulling off a strong showing in Iowa, Rick Santorum benefited from his own persistence, a faltering field of former front-runners and a savvy strategy.
abstract: Rick Santorum's strong showing in the Iowa Republican caucuses, bringing him to a virtual two-way tie for the lead with Mitt Romney, reflects his own persistence, a faltering field of former front-runners and a savvy strategy; relying on his own instincts, he used no speechwriters and had a skeletal advertising budget.
lead_paragraph: In pulling off a strong showing in Iowa, Rick Santorum benefited from his own persistence, a faltering field of former front-runners and a savvy strategy.

headline.main: Out of Santorum’s Lean Operation, a Muscular Result
headline.print_headline: Out of Santorum’s Lean Operation, a Muscular Result at the Caucuses
